title: Ayakashi Parade in mahorova
description: HAMA Tours received a request for individuals to participate in a cosplay event in mahorova. The team selected to participate consisted of Kuguri, Nanaki, Kinari, Nagi, and Ushio. However, the group faces unexpected creative differences while presenting cosplay ideas...
